titles.title: A resolution expressing the opposition of the Senate to the imposition of an import fee on crude oil and refined petroleum products.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S1498)
Referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 2/4/1993--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the Senate that neither the President nor the Congress should impose import fees on the importation of crude oil or refined petroleum products.
